entry.title: dotnet/announcements - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-12-13
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • .NET December 2022 Updates #243
  • Microsoft Security Advisory CVE 2022-41089 | .NET Remote Code Execution Vulnerability #242

entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-12-13
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • System.IO.Compression.ZipArchiveEntry Open method sometimes throws InvalidDataException in ZIP files over 4.2GB #79628
  • Assertion failed 'dest->TypeGet() == src->TypeGet()' in 'Vector2_3_4Test:RunVector2Tests()' #79626
  • Unnecessary assertion "jit\importer.cpp" #79625
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: JsonSerializerOptions.JsonObjectKeyPolicy (naming policy) #79624
  • Should MemoryExtensions.Trim use IndexOfAnyExcept? #79621
  • [NativeAOT] SIGABRT Crash in System.Security.Cryptography.OpenSsl.Tests #79619
  • dotnet 7 on win7 x86 Could not load file or assembly, A dynamic link library (DLL) initialization routine failed. (0x8007045A) #79616
  • .NET 7 console executable fails with 'Failed to create CoreCLR, HRESULT: 0x8007000E' on Debian Linux (Seedbox) #79612
  • How to manage connections towards Apache when MaxKeepAliveRequests is not infinite? #79610
  • Regressions in System.Globalization.Tests.StringEquality #79617
  • Regressions in System.Perf_Convert #79615
  • [Perf] Linux/x64: 7 Regressions on 12/11/2022 2:11:02 PM #79606
    8.0.0
  • [Perf] Linux/x64: 7 Regressions on 12/7/2022 12:36:41 PM #79605
    8.0.0
  • [Perf] Linux/x64: 142 Regressions on 12/7/2022 10:10:38 AM #79607
    8.0.0
  • [Perf] Linux/x64: 2 Regressions on 12/5/2022 7:07:15 PM #79604
    8.0.0
  • Static interface implementation bug #79603
  • Revise unimplemented NetFramework-specific analyzers #79602
  • Regressions in System.Collections.Sort<IntStruct> and System.Tests.Perf_Version #79618
  • [mono][perf] WASM disk size regression on 21 Nov 2022 #79599
    8.0.0
  • [mono][perf] WASM disk size regression on 15 Nov 2022 #79598
    8.0.0
  • Regex never completes #79596
  • [API Proposal]: Add Generic AddRange overloads to List and similar to improve performance #79593
  • Assembly unload logic with COM interop asserts #79588
    8.0.0
  • Infinite generic recursion over fields not detected #79587
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: make ZipArchive implement IAsyncDisposable #79586
  • [tvOS] Crash in System.Text.Json NullableTests.ClassWithDictionariesWithNullableValues #79583
    8.0.0
  • Test failure Regressions\\coreclr\\GitHub_34094\\Test34094\\Test34094.cmd #79582
  • Test failure Regressions\\coreclr\\GitHub_12224\\Test12224\\Test12224.cmd #79581
  • Failing tests in the Mono leg doesn't fail the CI #79579
    8.0.0
  • Publishing as NativeAOT should not depend on AppHost #79575
    8.0.0

Closed

  • Proposal: Enums should implement generic IEquatable/IComparable interfaces #17456
    Future
  • Consider using a faster memset #61561
    Future
  • [Feature request] A way to customize the line separator in StringBuilder #31115
    Future
  • .NET 6 application crash with unmanaged PAL_SEHException #78271
  • Consider providing a `string.Create` method which accepts a ROS<T> or ROS<char> as state #30175
    Future
  • X509Chain build does not work for OCSP only certificate for .Net 3.1 on Linux #79212
  • [Api Proposal] Generic Convert.ChangeType #31987
    Future
  • add method to directly round double to decimal #21670
    Future
  • mcs /dumpMap has stopped working #79568
  • When a delegate is created from a `DynamicMethod`, the `Method` property returns a `MethodInfo` which does not implement `CreateDelegate` #78365
    Future
  • Potential deadlock in EventListener #78233
    8.0.0
  • Framework trimming inlines CoreCLR's CoreLib into other inbox libraries #79513
    8.0.0
  • Server side ALPN support for SslStream on Mac #27727
    8.0.0
  • JsonSerializer no longer passes the CancellationToken to the AsyncEnumerable #79556
    8.0.0
  • Invalid cached console cursor position on Unix #77995
    8.0.0
  • System.Text.Json.JsonSerializer.DeserializeAsync throws JsonException when Stream contains trailing null terminators '0x00' #79559
  • [Android] ImportExport.ImportZeroModulus crypto test fails #79584
  • Is it expected that the host.native subset fails on a fresh build (when the single file host isn't yet built)? #79144
    8.0.0
  • [Perf] Linux/x64: 5 Regressions on 11/17/2022 7:01:39 PM #78826
  • [Perf] Linux/arm64: 3 Regressions on 11/18/2022 1:00:00 AM #78821
  • [mono][interp] tiering.c:82, condition `is_ok (error)' not met #79468
    8.0.0
  • [Perf] Linux/x64: 2 Regressions on 11/4/2022 2:24:58 AM #78838
  • Named pipe Allow_Connection_UnderDifferentUsers_ForClientReading test fails on Mono on Windows #79180
    Future
  • System.DirectoryServices GroupPrincipal.GetMembers gives Exception on Domain Local groups #24935
    Future
  • jit disasm is confusing for R2R helpers with different entry points #69635
    8.0.0
  • ASP.NET 5 docker image fails to communicate with TLS1.2 server #48337
    8.0.0
  • System.Security.Cryptography.Xml 7.0.0 package doesn't work on .NET Framework #79576

PullRequests

Created

  • Disable loop alignment during asmdiffs #79629
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Only apply addlDelta for IMAGE_REL_BASED_REL32 relocs #79627
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add version info to NativeAOT Unix apps #79623
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [wasm] optional legacy JS interop #79622
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Update Proxy-Support check to be case insensitive #79620
    area-System.Net.Http, 6.0.x
  • [release/7.0] [mono][interp] Add unbox when calling valuetype method through delegate #79614
    Servicing-approved, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono, 7.0.x
  • Add nullable reference type annotations to System.Text.Json source gen #79613
    area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • JIT: Refactor gtExtractSideEffList and fix GTF_DEBUG_NODE_MORPHED propagation #79611
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Create Microsoft.NET.ILLink.Tasks package #79609
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [Android] Fix SslStream.IsMutuallyAuthenticated #79601
    area-System.Net.Security, os-android
  • Remove System.Text.Json prebuilt #79600
    area-Infrastructure
  • Reduce the number of forced `MethodTable`s #79594
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [Test] noop change to see if tests pass #79591
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [mono] Work around crashes when doing code patching on rosetta. #79590
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Use `Unsafe.NullRef()` #79589
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • Remove unnecesary library selection checking #79577
    area-Interop-coreclr, community-contribution

Merged

  • [wasm] Disable running blazor template projects #79536
    test-failure, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Fix ordering of checks in AppendInterpolatedStringHandler.AppendFormatted #79539
    area-System.Runtime
  • Implement DynamicMethod.RTDynamicMethod.CreateDelegate. #79427
    area-System.Reflection, community-contribution
  • Take EventListener.EventListenersLock in EventPipeEventDispatcher.SendCommand #79185
    area-Tracing-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Use ReferencePathWithRefAssemblies for libs ILLink #79595
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, linkable-framework
  • support server ALPN on macOS #79434
    area-System.Net.Security, os-mac-os-x
  • Fix memory leaks reported by static analyzer #78492
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [wasm] fix browser profiler exceptions #79608
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • Fix mcs -dumpMap #79571
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix JsonSerializer.SerializeAsync not passing the cancellation token to converters #79562
    area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • [wasm] Add few Span and String measurements #79566
  • [wasm] Let browser-bench post bootstrap flag #79573
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Console.Unix: don't calculate cached cursor position from the last column. #78466
    area-System.Console, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • [mono] Fix passing of NULL via mono_runtime_invoke to method expecting nullable #79597
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Handle RSA zero modulus for Android #79585
    area-System.Security, os-android
  • Don't require singlefilehost in host.native #79565
    area-Host
  • Fix up NativeAOT testing #79523
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [mono][interp] Fix some issues that are hit in tests when we tier up methods immediately #79564
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Condition some NamedPipe tests on COM support #79578
    area-System.IO
  • Adding new ReadyToRun helper for static cctor #76898
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix versions of the .NET 8 ILC package #79497
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Preparation for JIT\Regression test merging - assembly/file renames #79489
    test-enhancement, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • fix SslStream.IsMutuallyAuthenticated with cached credentials #79128
    area-System.Net.Security

Updated

  • [JIT] X64 - Extend emitter peephole optimization of eliminating unnecessary `mov` instructions #79381
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Double IndexOf throughput for chars #78861
    area-System.Memory, tenet-performance, 8.0.0
  • [Merge-on-Red] - Implement Test Process Watcher #78742
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Remove the TypeKey concept as the primary user for the concept is unable to use it effectively. #79418
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator
  • JIT: experiment with early liveness and use it for forward sub and last-use copy elision #79346
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Always set `addlDelta` to zero on x86 #79467
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [draft][wasi] compile with libs.native #79046
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • Remove RequiresDynamicCode from Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection #79425
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection
  • This fixes emitGetVexPrefixSize to support detecting 2-byte prefix support #79478
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Enable AVX512 Additional 16 SIMD Registers #79544
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-avx512
  • Dynamic generate hwintrinsic tests #79552
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics
  • Produce crashreport.json and use llvm-symbolizer to create stack trace #77578
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • ifdef out unsupported Enum underlying types for nativeaot #79472
  • Fix the multicore performance of mapping from an instruction pointer to a MethodDesc #79021
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Add code to create the different ILLink packages #79480
    needs-author-action, area-Tools-ILLink, 8.0.0
  • Re-Enable SendRecvPollSync_TcpListener_Socket Test #79145
    area-System.Net.Sockets
  • [release/7.0][Android] Fix SslStream on legacy Android API levels #79280
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net.Security, os-android, 7.0.3
  • [release/6.0][Android] Fix SslStream on legacy Android API levels #79277
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net.Security, os-android, 6.0.14
  • Replace successive "ldr" and "str" instructions with "ldp" and "stp" #77540
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Make System.Reflection.Emit public types abstract #78544
    area-System.Reflection.Emit, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [mono] Initial support for unloadable ALCs #77399
    area-AssemblyLoader-mono
  • Use non-generic Array.Sort in EnumInfo on nativeaot #79473
  • [release/7.0] Fix compression #79547
    area-System.Net, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [release/6.0] Fix compression #79549
    area-System.Net, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Respect SETTINGS_MAX_HEADER_LIST_SIZE on HTTP/2 and HTTP/3 #79281
    area-System.Net.Http, 8.0.0
  • JIT: Allow sharing call temps within statements #79574
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Equalize committed space in free regions and move regions to global free list #77597
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Emit mneg for mul+neg on Arm64 #79550
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [NativeAOT] Thin locks #79519
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [release/6.0][wasm] Partially fix issue caused during VS upgrade #79572
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 6.0.14
  • [mono][aot] Optimize constrained calls made from gsharedvt methods. #79339
    NO-MERGE
  • Adding the Vector512 and Vector512<T> types #76642
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, arch-avx512
  • Optimize the SqlGuid struct #72549
    area-System.Data.SqlClient, community-contribution
  • Allow preinitializing types with canonical forms #79384
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix thread-safety issues with enumerating ResourceManager. #75054
    area-System.Resources, community-contribution
  • Implement DivRem intrinsic for X86 #66551
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-12-13
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • NativeAot-LLVM: problem with NarrowFourUtf16CharsToAsciiAndWriteToBuffer #2114

PullRequests

Created

  • NativeAOT-LLVM: Trunc llvm values when building GT_STORE_IND to a smaller int type #2115

Merged

  • NativeAOT-LLVM : Fix assert when GT_FIELD_LIST has > 1 member and is emitted as an LLVM primitive #2113
  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Unify call lowering and codegen; support inline throw helpers #2103

Updated

  • Merge to last NativeAot commit #2111
  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Exception handling: funclets #2109

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-12-13
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Add option to specify environment from testenvironments.json on CLI #29516
  • Microsoft.DotNet.ApiSymbolExtensions binary is missing from the SDK, causing API compat failures in 8.0 #29511

Closed

  • "MSB4018 ResolveTargetingPackAssets task failed unexpectedly" after updating to 7.0.100 #29517
  • Have a bug #29515
  • Mody2838@gmail.com #29492

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.1xx' => 'release/7.0.2xx' #29531
    Area-Infrastructure
  • add item template for directory.build.props and directory.build.targets #29526
    Area-Templates, Area-Common templates
  • add class template #29518
    Area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • Update target framework version in toolsetinfo for NET 8. #29316
  • Update releases-index.json #29445
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update minimum msbuild to 17.4 #29416
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Add support for an explicit interface implementation methods #29471
    Area-GenAPI
  • Fix typo in GivenTransitiveFrameworkReferencesAreDisabled.cs #29512

Updated

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.2xx' => 'main' #29397
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Make `dotnet publish` use `Release` by default in 8.0+ Projects #29155
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2066787 #29494
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Don't Infer RID outside of dotnet publish for PublishSingleFile/PublishAot #29031
    area-runtime, Document for breaking changes, Area-CLI, Area-SingleFile, Area-NativeAOT
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'release/7.0.1xx' #29341
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Fix garbage collection for aliased workload packs #29508
    Area-Workloads

Issues

Updated

  • Champion "Allow Generic Attributes" #124

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-12-13
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • CSharpNavigationBar.TestProperties is flaky #65988
  • Rank AsyncCompletionSessionDataSnapshot.Defaults over IntelliCode starred suggestions #65982
  • Roslyn fails to correctly infer nullable annotations in list patterns' variables #65976
  • Structure guidelines wrong for class initializer, when using constructor which also uses a class initializer #65970
  • `IPropertyReferenceOperation` isn't produced for `nameof(Prop)` only in VB #65969
  • Assert fired at Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.CSharp.Symbols.TypeWithAnnotations..ctor #65968
  • Run Code Analysis command does not report any violations when LSP pull diagnostics is enabled #65967
  • Ref safety analysis should be implemented with a single pass #65961
    17.5

Closed

  • SolutionState should enforce changes to a document happen to all links of that document atomically. #65797
    17.6
  • VB Code gen optimization: Use `Array.Empty<T>()` for `Dim x(-1) As T` #65933
    Backlog
  • API to determine if a syntax tree contains *conditional* directives. #65792
  • Shift core projects from netcore3.1 to net6.0 #65905
  • `throw` in switch expressions doesn't parse properly #65934

PullRequests

Created

  • Merge 17.6-vs-deps back into release/dev17.6 #65991
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Remove main-vs-deps #65990
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Merge main-vs-deps back into main #65989
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Support MemberNotNull on required members in nullable analysis #65987
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Required Members
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 327: Build ID 2066786 #65986
  • Add support for distinct LSP diagnostic categories in LSP Pull Diagnostics. #65985
    Area-IDE
  • Adding AsPublicInterfaceImplementation ability to handle expression-bodied #65984
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Semantic snippets - `propg` and `propi` snippets #65979
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Wait for next input prompt to avoid duplicate output read #65978
    Area-Interactive
  • Option key2 #65977
    Area-IDE
  • Improve sharing of trees when changing project configuration #65974
    Area-IDE
  • Breaking change: Disallow raw-string-literal interpolations at start of line when indentation-whitespace is present. #65973
    Area-Compilers
  • Merge main to release/dev17.6 #65972
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Produce error when static local function captures a local with extension method method group conversion #65965
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Update PublicAPI.Shipped for 17.4 #65956
    Area-Infrastructure, Needs API Review
  • Merge release/dev17.5-vs-deps to main-vs-deps #65952
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Merged

  • Merge main into features/SharedSyntaxTrees #65975
    Area-IDE
  • Remove a bunch of compatibility shims for TypeScript #65897
    Area-IDE
  • Add support for draft of semantic tokens LSIF spec to LSIF generator #65860
    Area-IDE, Community, Next
  • Localize 17.5 shipping branch #65981
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #65964
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.6 to release/dev17.6-vs-deps #65983
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/FixAllNamingViolation #65752
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Service broker interface changes #65957
    Area-IDE
  • Bump mac editor and implement CocoaTextBufferVisibilityTracker #65568
    Area-IDE, Community, Next
  • Move BasicBuild to new integration test framework and implement #65889
    Area-IDE, Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Revert "Merge pull request #65819 from dibarbet/adjust_logging" #65958
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Use newer msbuild versions #65947
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.6 to release/dev17.6-vs-deps #65918
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Add new API to easily tell if a node contains conditional directives (without allocations). #65794
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Delete duplicate test #65966
    Area-Compilers, Community, Next
  • Merge main to release/dev17.6 #65962
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main-vs-deps to release/dev17.6-vs-deps #65963
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #65953
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge main to release/dev17.6 #65959
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main-vs-deps to release/dev17.6-vs-deps #65960
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Add more InternalVisibleTos #65954
    Area-IDE
  • Switch some code from HostWorkspaceServices to SolutionServices #65950
    Area-IDE

Updated

  • Update all linked files to have the same content object instances when updating the workspace's solution. #65885
    Area-IDE
  • reduce the amount of time that we switch from a background thread to … #65641
    Area-IDE
  • Adjust calculation of invocation escape when return type is ref to ref struct #65857
    Area-Compilers
  • Fix line breaks between members when a property has an initializer #65924
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Refactor snippets #65811
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Avoid reporting ref safety errors for discard assignments #65693
    Area-Compilers
  • Add tests for CheckInvocationArgMixing #65916
    Area-Compilers
  • Expose constructor that allows for AnalysisOptions and a CancellationToken. #65051
    Area-Analyzers, api-approved
  • Emit `DecimalConstantAttribute` for synthesized delegates and local functions #65777
    Area-Compilers
  • Deprecate public constructors of various diagnostic analysis context types #64083
    Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers
  • Bind and emit Primary Constructor #65899
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Primary Constructors
  • Split out ref safety analysis into a separate pass after binding #64928
    Area-Compilers
  • Ban usage of public options in Roslyn #65930
    Area-IDE
  • run bootstrap build on linux #65942
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Avoid boxing in BoundDagTest.GetHashCode #65939
    Area-Compilers

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-12-13
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Route parameter TryParse checks does not handle handler parameters with [FromRoute] attribute where name is provided. #45581
  • Multiple memory leaks when restarting WebApplication #45579
  • [AOT] Make BindConverter safe for AOT or mark as unsafe #45578
  • AddRazorRuntimeCompilation is hardcoded to use SHA1 for checksum comparison and PrecompiledView are provided with SHA256 checksum. #45577
  • Automate template updates into dotnet/installer #45576
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Blazor Server PersistComponentState public Persist/TryTake from byte[] methods #45574
  • Perf regression: fortunes_dapper #45571
  • Perf improvement: connectionclosehttps, fortunes, plaintext_nodejs #45570
  • Enable ALPN tests/features on MAC #45569
  • Adding Http(Request/Response) extension methods overloads accepting non-generic JsonTypeInfo #45568
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Add CancellationToken to UserManager<>/SignInManager<> #45567
  • Blazor - Virtualization, mixing data between components on first load #45565
  • OutputCacheAttribute ignores excludeDefaultPolicy if a custom BasePolicy is defined #45564
  • Add ASPNETCORE_URLS_GRPC change #45563
  • Perf improvement: json, json_nodejs #45560

Closed

  • Targeting pack PlatformManifest.txt built by source-build has differences vs. official build #37651
  • ASP.Net Core 6 SignInManager PasswordSignInAsync throws provider null exception #44431
    Discussions
  • Stop Collecting CI Test Bin Logs #37343
  • Weird mix of Turkish and English when restoring #39978
  • Perf regression: updates #45561
  • Run `startvscode.sh` returns a syntax error #40250
    7.0-preview3
  • Update to latest stable version of Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.PublicApiAnalyzers (3.3.3) to fix Roslyn crashing issue #41099
    7.0-preview6
  • JSON polymorphic serialization does not add $type to single controller results #45548
  • 404 with _content/Microsoft.AspNetCore.Components.CustomElements/BlazorCustomElements.js #45558
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_dapper, fortunes_ef #45534
  • Perf improvement: plainTextWithFilter #45546
  • Issues hit with BuildFromSource.md doc #44346
    .NET 8 Planning
  • gRpc transcoding is not working- unable to find annotation.proto and http.proto are thrown #45287

PullRequests

Created

  • [AOT] Fix Web UI AOT Warnings #45580
    area-blazor
  • remove duplicate null check #45575
    area-blazor, community-contribution
  • Try running Diagnostics.FunctionalTests in Helix #45573
    area-runtime
  • Fix support for parameter names sourced from attributes #45572
    area-web-frameworks
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 2066599 #45566
    area-infrastructure
  • [release/7.0] [TS Client] Fix CompletionMessage result when passing false or null #45559
    area-signalr

Merged

  • Correct XML Doc spelling mistake #45562
    area-security, community-contribution, 8.0-preview1
  • Add compatibility suppression files to repo #45507
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview1

Updated

  • Get EmptyHttpResult in RDF via reflection #45354
    area-runtime, area-web-frameworks
  • [release/2.1] Turn on Component Governance #40885
    blocked, area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 2.1.x
  • Reimplement the default object pool for improved performance #45251
    Perf, area-runtime, community-contribution
  • DefaultProblemDetailsWriter.CanWrite without Accept header #45158
    area-web-frameworks

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-12-13
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Exception when adding a child view to AbsoluteLayout, then removing it, and then adding it again. #12074

  • .NET MAUI Button stays gray after enabling on start on Android Emulator in Release configuration #12072

  • MAUI Windows Build - ScrollView Scrolled Event arrives too late!! #12068
  • Behavior and locals don't match execution order when debugging iOS (on remote simulator) MAUI app #12067
  • RemainingItemsThreshold not working on Windows #12066
  • Maui TabbedPage breaks in windows when navigating #12065
  • Setter showing a Build Error when using XAML OnPlatform Markup Extension #12064
  • [WinUI] Add logic to set `DefaultLabelPosition` on the WinUI CommandBar #12063
  • Can't Install MAUI tools with MS OpenJDK preinstalled #12058
  • [Android] Button Corner Radius is broken with high BorderWidth values #12056
    Backlog
  • Picker Items not showing when BindingContext is changed from null to value at runtime #12055
    Backlog
  • [Android] A big image overflow the Button #12054
    Backlog
  • [iOS] Button FontAttributes not working #12053
    Backlog
  • File picker not work when publish MAUI as exe on Windows server 2019 +windows 10 #12052
  • Appshell menu item click, content page changes with glitch #12051
  • Possible Memoryleaks? #12048
    Backlog
  • Hot Reload for .NET maui #12047
  • Pair to Mac failed with the error "Failed to install manifest microsoft.net.workload.mono.toolchain.net6 version 7.0.1..." #12046
  • iOS - Button in CollectionView footer auto expands to full width unless wrapped in another StackLayout #12045
  • Frame not working in iOS ListView #12044
    Backlog

Closed

  • [Feature Request] Windows Toolbar items Remove the 3 dots to access the toolbar item #7034
    Backlog
  • .NET MAUI Windows content escapes window into toolbar #11300
    Backlog
  • iOS Thickness should be multiple to 2 #11769
  • [CollectionView] Can CollectionView recycle its items (Views) rather than creating new ones? #12057
  • iOS CollectionView cell-reuse issues with Converters #9791
    Backlog
  • MAUI App UI Elements disappear on iOS when Instabug is initialized #11854

PullRequests

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-12-13
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • How to access the principal entity given an owned entity? #29848
  • Upgrade to EFCore 7 Results in Unexpected Index Changes #29847
  • How to create the query which is translated into SQL declaring multiple entries deletion by WHERE condition? #29846
  • Distinct string.Join or string.Concat causing SQL Syntax error #29845
  • Relations in ef c not mapped in sqlite provider #29844
  • List constructs EF uses that require non-public code access #29843
  • Optimize reading a single value from the result set #29842
  • Use SqlCommand.EnableOptimizedParameter #29841
  • Query/Shaper: consider adding names to variables we generate #29840
  • Json: consider deduplication when projecting scalars #29839

Closed

  • First Query take 8 seconds even with Compiled models #29827
  • [Performance] GetManyByKeys - Am I missing something? It´s fast! #29676

PullRequests

Merged

  • Bump Microsoft.AspNetCore.OData from 8.0.11 to 8.0.12 #29834
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:

Updated

  • Fix to #29513 - Json: improve projection deduplication for scenarios containing collection indexers #29808
  • Bump SQLitePCLRaw.bundle_e_sqlcipher from 2.1.2 to 2.1.3 #29836
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:
  • [release/7.0] Avoid redundant looping in property metadata #29807
    Servicing-consider
